Discrete Action Agent

Source: R/agent_base.R
AgentArmed.Rd

A R6Class to represent Discrete Action Agent or Armed Agent

AgentArmed

Format

R6Class object

Value

[AgentArmed].

Member Variables

interact

[Interaction]
Interaction object between Agent and Environment.

mem

[ReplayMem]
Replay memory for the Agent

brain

[Surrogate]
A Surrogate model to evaluate the current state.

model

[Surrogate]
A reference to the Surrogate model.

Methods

updatePara(name, val)

[function]
Function to update parameter setting.

continue(new_env, iter)

[function]
Continue with a new environment new_env for iter number of episodes

learn(iter)

[function]
Run iter number of Episodes
